content: {"name": "Christian Ministry of Lincoln County - Soup Kitchen", "alternate_name": "", "description": "WE SERVE LINCOLN COUNTY RESIDENCES", "email": "", "url": "https://christianministryoflincolncounty.org/emergency-services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "230 East Water Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Lincolnton", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28092", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.4713482, "longitude": -81.2537919}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 748-4961", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Financial assistance for some bills, proof required"}]}
